name: Number Slider.
description:
Number Slider is a classic logical puzzle game, the target is move all the tiles into sequence as less as steps, as soon as possible. We well designed 12 different levels, you should pass it one by one, and levels are becoming more and more difficulty.

Features:
3 x 3 to 14 x 14;
Jigsaw Puzzle;
Night Mode;
2048, 4096, 8192;
Minesweeper Easy/Medium/Hard;

It's our new 3-30 game, which means only 3 megabytes but can bring you over 30 minutes happiness time!

Hope you like our new puzzle game, more game please follow us https://www.tumblr.com/blog/azhuona
